gui

Class PauseMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.PauseMenu

  • public class PauseMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates UI for pause menu and adds needed buttons. Each time the game is paused, this UI appears.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PauseMenu()
      Constructor to create all needed objects.

        public void createPauseMenu()
        This method creates pause menu an adds needed components to it. It also adds needed action listeners.

      • askUser

        public void askUser()
        This method handles the frame for asking the player. It adds leave button and cancel button to the frame with their mouse listeners.
